question: Task 1You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You live in a room in college which you share with another student.However, there are many problems with this arrangement and you find itvery difficult to work.Write a letter to the accommodation officer at the college. In the letter,• describe the situation• explain your problems and why it is difficult to work• say what kind of accommodation you would preferWrite at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with my current roommate. This is my first term here e she is a sophomore, that alone is already unpleasant, as she is always partying and bringing strange people to our room and I am always studying, however, my complaint is mostly because she is messy, every day I have to put her things away, she does not even make her bed and besides that, she is nosy, noisy, and clumsy.
The other day, I came back to the dorm and found out that she had broken my favorite mug, which was a gift from my parents. That was the last straw!

It is getting really hard to concentrate and I do not know how long I can take it. Just to clarify, I am not requesting a single room, but I would really appreciate it if you could arrange to put me in a room with someone from the same year and course.
I look forward to your reply

error_list.error_des: The spelling of favorite is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
